entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Adding WebAssembly to Blazor Web App template fails: dotnet.js not found #56013
  • Perf regression: plaintext #56012
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes_ef #56011
  • Large remote videos fail to load in Blazor #56005

Closed

  • [System.Text.Json] Serializer loses precision on ulong #52393
    Backlog
  • Lazy Loading separate Razor Class Library project in Blazor Web App #55985
  • Perf regression: fortunes #56001
  • ee84ffdd685e0b8ebe1e61e44d47ac7e69d0d146 #56009
  • Better UX - show "loading" (anything) while app is starting up the .NET WebAssembly runtime (for AutoRender, prerender false) #55997
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudUpdateProduct #56002
  • Perf regression: mapaction, multiple_queries #55976
  • Perf improvement: json #56000
  • ResultContext<TOptions>.Result missing nullable annotation #45594
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump update-dotnet-sdk action #56010
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [release/2.1] (deps): Bump modules/EntityFrameworkCore from `74055e1` to `268817f` #56008
    area-infrastructure, 2.1.x
  • [release/8.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `d83fee1` to `a7f443b` #56007
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `d83fee1` to `a7f443b` #56006
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x

Merged

  • Add nullable annotation to ResultContext<TOptions>.Result #55948
    community-contribution, area-security, 9.0-preview6

Updated

  • Fixed LDAP nested group claims #55707
    community-contribution, area-security
  • Fixing minimal api header array binding #55803
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Allow HTTP2 encoder to split headers across frames #55322
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Log whether the localization resource is found or not #55897
    community-contribution, area-ui-rendering
  • Microsoft.extensions.api description.server allow specifying environment #55836
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add HTML title attribute to "th" elements #55837
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • [OutputCaching] OutputCacheOptions.ApplicationServices is always null during initialization #55847
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • Backport #51506 to .NET 8 #55865
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware, 8.0.x
  • Unquarantine FrameworkParametersCompletionProviderTests #55857
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun
